price: সিহঁতে ইজনে সিজনক এই বিষয়ে অছিয়ত কৰিছে নেকি? বৰং সিহঁত হৈছে সীমালঙ্ঘনকাৰী সম্প্ৰদায়।
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
